## Description {#details}

When <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho">MachO</a> binaries include a LC&#95;CODE&#95;SIGNATURE load command, the &#95;&#95;LINKEDIT data segment will include a section corresponding to the LC&#95;CODE&#95;SIGNATURE load command.

This section serves as a signature for the binary. Included in the CodeSignature section is a header followed by a hash of the binary. If present, the CodeSignature section is the last component of the binary.

Definition at line 25 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/objcopy/lib/objcopy/macho/macholayoutbuilder-h">MachOLayoutBuilder.h</a>.
